item.content:encoded:
Hi! I’m @mrtazz

I sometimes write words ðŸ“  https://unwiredcouch.com.
I enjoy reading paper books ðŸ“šhttps://unwiredcouch.com/reading/.
And try to make time for drawing and painting ðŸŽ¨: https://unwiredcouch.com/art.
Sometimes I post on Mastodon ðŸ¦£: https://chaos.social/@mrtazz
I used to give a bunch of talks ðŸŽ¤ https://unwiredcouch.com/talks/.

Fun things I wrote or contributed to

  • A Linter/analyzer for Makefiles
  • A C++ client for making HTTP/REST requests
  • A simple stats daemon
  • A mail attachment extractor
  • A plugin for vim for my planning
  • A plugin for vim for SimpleNote
  • Some LaTeX templates to write official looking German letters
  • A C++ library for rendering mustache templates
  • A facilitation guide for blameless learning reviews
  • A patch for GNU make for a more fun output
  • A silly little testing framework for bash
